requirement_tested: A question submission form with fields for question title and content
user_persona: A curious student named Alex who has a question about calculus.
user_goal: To submit a new question to the Q&A platform.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Submit Question
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the homepage and notices a prominent 'Ask a Question' button styled in saddle brown.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Ask a Question' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A form appears with fields for entering a question title and content, both with appropriate placeholders.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out the Form
narrative_steps.description: Alex fills in the title field with 'How do I find the derivative of x^2?' and describes the problem in detail in the content area.
narrative_steps.action: Type into the title and content fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The text is captured accurately in both input fields. The submit button becomes active.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Question
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with the wording, Alex clicks the submit button to post the question.
narrative_steps.action: Click the submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The question is sent via POST request to the backend API, and Alex sees a confirmation or is redirected to the question list.

requirement_tested: A page displaying a list of submitted questions with titles and excerpts
user_persona: Jamie, a frequent visitor looking for existing answers before posting a new question.
user_goal: To browse through previously asked questions to avoid duplication.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting the Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Jamie opens the website and is greeted by a beige background with a clean layout.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of questions is displayed in card format, each showing a title and an excerpt of the content.

narrative_steps.title: Scanning Through Questions
narrative_steps.description: Jamie scans the titles and brief descriptions of the questions listed.
narrative_steps.action: Visually scan the question cards.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each card clearly shows the title and excerpt, styled with saddle brown borders for visual separation.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Relevant Question
narrative_steps.description: Seeing a potentially related question titled 'Understanding Derivatives', Jamie decides to click on it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Understanding Derivatives' question card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The browser navigates to the detailed view of the selected question.

requirement_tested: A detailed question page showing the full question and associated answers
user_persona: Taylor, a math tutor checking if someone needs help with derivatives.
user_goal: To read a full question and review all submitted answers.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Detailed View
narrative_steps.description: Taylor lands on the detailed question page after clicking from the list.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the detailed question page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The full title and content of the question are displayed at the top of the page.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Answers Section
narrative_steps.description: Below the question, Taylor looks for responses from other users.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down to the answers section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All answers submitted for this question are listed below, each in its own card with beige background and saddle brown accents.

requirement_tested: An answer submission form accessible on each question's detail page
user_persona: Jordan, a knowledgeable peer ready to help others understand complex topics.
user_goal: To provide a helpful answer to a question they just read.

narrative_steps.title: Locating Answer Form
narrative_steps.description: After reading a question about integrals, Jordan scrolls to the bottom where the answer form resides.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the question detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An answer submission form with a text area and a submit button styled in saddle brown is visible.

narrative_steps.title: Writing the Answer
narrative_steps.description: Jordan writes out a clear explanation of how to solve the integral step-by-step.
narrative_steps.action: Enter text into the answer text area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The text area captures the input without issues.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting the Answer
narrative_steps.description: Confident in the clarity of the response, Jordan submits the answer.
narrative_steps.action: Click the submit button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The answer is posted via a POST request to the backend and appears in the answers list immediately.

requirement_tested: Answer display section under each question showing all submitted answers
user_persona: Casey, a student preparing for an exam by reviewing past Q&A threads.
user_goal: To study multiple answers for a single question to gain deeper understanding.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Question Details
narrative_steps.description: Casey navigates to a specific question about limits in calculus.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the detailed question page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The question content is fully visible at the top.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Submitted Answers
narrative_steps.description: Casey examines several answers listed under the question, noting differences in approaches.
narrative_steps.action: Read through each answer card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Multiple distinct answers are shown, each in its own styled card with rating information.

requirement_tested: Rating functionality allowing users to upvote or downvote answers
user_persona: Morgan, a community moderator ensuring quality content rises to the top.
user_goal: To improve the visibility of accurate and helpful answers by rating them.

narrative_steps.title: Finding Helpful Answer
narrative_steps.description: Morgan reads a well-explained answer and wants to give credit for good work.
narrative_steps.action: Locate the upvote button next to the answer.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An upward-pointing arrow icon (▲) is visible beside the current rating count.

narrative_steps.title: Upvoting the Answer
narrative_steps.description: Morgan clicks the upvote button to increase the score of the answer.
narrative_steps.action: Click the upvote (▲) button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A PATCH request is sent to update the rating in the database, and the UI reflects the change.

requirement_tested: Real-time updating of answer ratings without page refresh
user_persona: Riley, watching a live discussion unfold online while relaxing at home.
user_goal: To observe real-time feedback on answers as others interact with them.

narrative_steps.title: Staying on Page During Discussion
narrative_steps.description: Riley keeps the question page open while others continue voting on answers.
narrative_steps.action: Remain on the question detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: WebSocket connection is established to listen for rating updates.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Real-Time Rating Changes
narrative_steps.description: As another user votes on an answer, Riley sees the number change instantly.
narrative_steps.action: Watch for rating changes.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Upon receiving a 'answer_rated' event, the relevant answer’s rating count updates automatically without reloading the page.

requirement_tested: Persistent storage of questions, answers, and ratings in a PostgreSQL database
user_persona: Devon, a developer verifying that data persists correctly after app restarts.
user_goal: To ensure that all content remains available even after restarting the application.

narrative_steps.title: Creating Content Before Restart
narrative_steps.description: Devon creates a question, adds an answer, and rates it before shutting down the app.
narrative_steps.action: Submit a question, add an answer, and rate it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All actions result in successful API calls and database entries.

narrative_steps.title: Restarting Application
narrative_steps.description: Devon stops and then restarts the application to test data persistence.
narrative_steps.action: Stop and start the application servers.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Upon restart, all previously created content and ratings remain intact when viewed again.

requirement_tested: Backend API endpoints for creating, retrieving, and rating questions and answers
user_persona: Quinn, a backend engineer validating that all necessary endpoints function properly.
user_goal: To confirm that all CRUD operations for questions and answers are supported by working endpoints.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Creation Endpoints
narrative_steps.description: Quinn uses Postman to send requests to create a question and an answer.
narrative_steps.action: Send POST requests to /api/questions and /api/questions/{id}/answers.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New records are successfully created in the database and returned with proper status codes.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Retrieval Endpoints
narrative_steps.description: Quinn retrieves the list of questions and details of one specific question.
narrative_steps.action: Send GET requests to /api/questions and /api/questions/{id}.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Correct data sets are returned matching what was previously inserted.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Ratings via API
narrative_steps.description: Finally, Quinn tests modifying an answer's rating using the dedicated endpoint.
narrative_steps.action: Send a PATCH request to /api/answers/{id}/rate.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The specified answer's rating value in the database is updated accordingly.

requirement_tested: Frontend components styled with a beige background and saddle brown accents
user_persona: Pat, a designer auditing the consistency of the visual theme across the application.
user_goal: To verify that the entire frontend adheres to the defined color scheme.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Overall Theme
narrative_steps.description: Pat loads the homepage and inspects the general background color.
narrative_steps.action: Open the homepage and inspect body styles.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The background color is consistently set to beige throughout the page.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Component Accents
narrative_steps.description: Pat examines interactive elements like buttons and headers.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect styles of buttons and headings.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interactive elements and headers utilize the saddle brown accent color as defined in the stylesheet.

requirement_tested: User interface for browsing and navigating between questions and answers
user_persona: Skyler, exploring the site for educational purposes during lunch break.
user_goal: To seamlessly move between the question list and individual question details.

narrative_steps.title: Starting From Question List
narrative_steps.description: Skyler begins on the main questions listing page.
narrative_steps.action: Load the questions list page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A clear list of questions with titles and excerpts is presented.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Question Detail
narrative_steps.description: Skyler clicks on a question to see more details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a question card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Client-side routing takes Skyler to the question detail page smoothly without full page reload.

narrative_steps.title: Returning to Question List
narrative_steps.description: After reading, Skyler uses the navigation bar to go back to the list.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Questions' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Skyler returns to the questions list page efficiently using React Router.

requirement_tested: Database schema including tables for questions, answers, and answer ratings
user_persona: Bailey, a database administrator ensuring schema integrity during deployment.
user_goal: To validate that the correct relational tables exist with appropriate constraints.

narrative_steps.title: Connecting to Database
narrative_steps.description: Bailey accesses the configured PostgreSQL instance using provided credentials.
narrative_steps.action: Connect to the PostgreSQL database using DB_HOST, DB_PORT, etc.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Successful connection to the myapp database with access to defined tables.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Table Structure
narrative_steps.description: Bailey checks the structure of the questions and answers tables.
narrative_steps.action: Run DESCRIBE or equivalent commands on questions and answers tables.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tables match the defined schema, with correct column names, types, and foreign key relationships.

requirement_tested: Environment variable configuration for connecting to PostgreSQL database
user_persona: Cameron, setting up the project for local development.
user_goal: To configure environment variables so the backend can connect to the database.

narrative_steps.title: Creating Environment File
narrative_steps.description: Cameron creates a .env file in the backend directory with required database settings.
narrative_steps.action: Create a .env file and populate with DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, etc.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Environment variables are saved correctly according to the template.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: Cameron starts the backend server which should now use these environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server process.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server initializes successfully and connects to the PostgreSQL database using values from the .env file.

requirement_tested: Package.json scripts for concurrent development server startup and dependency installation
user_persona: Drew, a new team member getting started with the codebase locally.
user_goal: To easily install dependencies and launch both frontend and backend servers simultaneously.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Drew runs the command to install all frontend and backend dependencies at once.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run install:all` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend node_modules folders are populated with necessary packages concurrently.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Once installed, Drew starts both development servers together.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run dev` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend development servers boot up concurrently, allowing Drew to begin development.

requirement_tested: Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: Avery, a busy parent accessing the Q&A site from a smartphone during commute.
user_goal: To navigate and contribute to discussions comfortably on a small screen.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Site on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Avery opens the Q&A site using a mobile browser.
narrative_steps.action: Load the website on a smartphone.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts responsively, stacking elements vertically for better readability.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Elements
narrative_steps.description: Despite the smaller screen, Avery finds forms and buttons appropriately sized.
narrative_steps.action: Tap through navigation links and interact with form inputs.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive elements are touch-friendly and spaced adequately for small screens.
